title: System UI crash loop on lock screen, any solutions yet?
content:
I ALREADY DID A FACTORY RESET. lasted a day.

I'm having the same problem I've seen on many other posts here alone. When I input the correct password on the locks screen it pauses for a a few seconds not doing anything and then the UI crashes and it goes back to the clock. I've looked for the apps supposedly need disabling, I've done a factory reset, I can't identify problem apps in safe mode because my phone is inaccessible one it's been restarted and I cant use the fingerprint unlock. If you are a Goole employee please dont bother  with "I'm sorry to hear that, try this link to our tips or check your warranty. Just tell me if anyone is even to fix this or I have to get another phone, I notice this issue is across all models so it sure won't be a Google phone.
